spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Run
spec_data.License: (GPL+ or Artistic) and (GPLv2+ or Artistic) and MIT
spec_data.Description:
These Perl modules are an improved test harness based on Test::Harness, but
more modular, extensible and object-oriented.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:13:41 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Extensible and object-oriented test harness for TAP scripts
